articles.author: Science Desk
articles.title: 265-million-year-old fossil belongs to oldest, largest South American predator before dinosaurs - The Indian Express
articles.description: Pampaphoneus biccai is the oldest and largest predator whose fossils were discovered in South America.
articles.content: The words ancient predator probably conjure up images of dinosaurs, most notably, the T.rex. But much before the age of dinosaurs, 40 million years before in fact, Pampaphoneus biccai roamed South Am… [+1684 chars]
